data.message:
Yo Em, I want to hollar at you on a movie project son. I ran for Detroit City Council and I am a candidate for State Rep in Lansing! About a situation that starts in NC and ends up in Detroit (90% of the movie), opening scene is in NC...get at man...real talk, business talk. Follow my blog on blogger: 
burgessfoster.blogspot.com check out my website:
www.FosterChangeN2009.info
Loving that work you and Dre put in on fiddy's new album. My favorites are So Disrespectful and Strong Enough!
